DOC.brief_summary: This study aim explore whether increased supply dietary plant sterol plant stanols influence serum level phytosterols consistency carotid atheromatous plaque .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Dietary Plant Sterols Plant Stanols Cholesterol Plant Sterol Levels Atheromatous Plaques
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind randomized study . The study population consist 30 consecutive patient undergo elective carotid endarterectomy due tight asymptomatic stenosis . The patient randomize two group consume either plant sterol ( 2g/day ) plant stanol ( 2g/day ) spread two six week , operation . Serum lipid , lipoproteins sterol analyzed randomization , operation one month operation . The carotid artery examine composition sterol . This study give new information concern relationship dietary consumption plant sterols stanols sterol composition carotid plaque .
